nodes.text: Pablo was a male Rodian arms dealer who owned a pawnshop on Nal Hutta during the Clone Wars. He encountered the bounty hunter Cad Bane, who wished for weapons from his pawnshop. After angering Bane, who had choked him, he and his partner were able to track down Bane, along with Obi-Wan Kenobi disguised as Rako Hardeen, and criminal mastermind Moralo Eval who were just getting ready to leave. Bane pushed "Hardeen" down, where he was caught by Gamorrean guards and taken captive.
Pablo was named after Pablo Hidalgo by Dave Filoni, the supervising director of Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
